Comment: I think Trump, after messing EVERYTHING UP IN 100 DAYS is looking for an easy win, and since Trump has no allies, only temporary people he can use, Trump is now throwing Putin under the bus. If he can be kept away from Putin and pro-russia forces, then he'll continue to lose support for Russia, if he answers a call from Putin or a pro-Russian advisor talks to him, expect another flip in his Russia policy.  That's the frustrating part about this administration, you never know when Trump's opinion will change, what's just talk and what will actually be taken action on.
